title: Sweet and Sour Ketchup Recipe
full_text:
Sweet and Sour Ketchup Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
6 servings
Makes
3/4 cup
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1/2
cup
ketchup
2
tablespoons
pineapple juice
2
tablespoons
brown sugar
1
tablespoon
rice vinegar
1
tablespoon
soy sauce
Directions
Whisk together ketchup, pineapple juice, brown sugar, vinegar, and soy sauce in a small bowl. Use immediately or transfer to an airtight container and store in refrigerator for up to two weeks.
